drawNow.label: Pick someone!
drawNow.tooltip: Draws a user from the queue.

PermissionDraw.label: Permission level
PermissionDraw.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

ResponseDraw.value: {name} : Hold fast or expire, your time has come!
ResponseDraw.label: Response
ResponseDraw.tooltip: Parameters available: {name} (winner), {t_tickets} (total tickets), {u_tickets} (winner tickets), {t_entries} (total redemptions), {u_entries} (winner redemptions), {t_usercount} (total entrants)

PermissionUser.label: Permission level (Get own entries)
PermissionUser.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionUserOther.label: Permission level (Get someone else's entries)
PermissionUserOther.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

ResponseUser.value: {name} : You currently have {u_tickets} ticket{pluralTickets} from {u_entries} channel point redemption{pluralEntries}
ResponseUser.label: Response (Own entries)
ResponseUser.tooltip: Parameters available:  {name} (user queried), {t_tickets} (total tickets), {u_tickets} (user tickets), {t_entries} (total redemptions), {u_entries} (user redemptions), {t_usercount} (total entrants), {pluralTickets} (Plurality 's' for tickets), {pluralEntries} (Plurality 's' for redemptions)

ResponseUserOther.value: {senderName} : {name} currently has {u_tickets} ticket{pluralTickets} from {u_entries} channel point redemption{pluralEntries}
ResponseUserOther.label: Response (Others entries)
ResponseUserOther.tooltip: Parameters available:  {senderName} (user sending request), {name} (user queried), {t_tickets} (total tickets), {u_tickets} (user tickets), {t_entries} (total redemptions), {u_entries} (user redemptions), {t_usercount} (total entrants), {pluralTickets} (Plurality 's' for tickets), {pluralEntries} (Plurality 's' for redemptions)

PermissionQueue.label: Permission level (Get queue stats)
PermissionQueue.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

ResponseQueue.value: {name} : there are presently {t_tickets} tickets across {t_entries} redemptions from {t_usercount} distinct viewers.
ResponseQueue.label: Response
ResponseQueue.tooltip: Parameters available:  {name} (user queried), {t_tickets} (total tickets), {t_entries} (total redemptions), {t_usercount} (total entrants), {pluralTickets} (Plurality 's' for tickets), {pluralEntries} (Plurality 's' for redemptions)

RewardValue1.label: Reward 1 Value
RewardValue1.tooltip: Number of entries Reward 1 counts as

RewardValue2.label: Reward 2 Value
RewardValue2.tooltip: Number of entries Reward 2 counts as

RewardEnable2.label: Enable 2nd Redemption
RewardEnable2.tooltip: Check this to use a second redemption

RewardValue3.label: Reward 3 Value
RewardValue3.tooltip: Number of entries Reward 3 counts as

RewardEnable3.label: Enable 3rd Redemption
RewardEnable3.tooltip: Check this to use a third redemption

appID.label: Dev.twitch.tv AppID
appID.tooltip: Get this from the dev portal

appSecret.label: Dev.twitch.tv App Secret
appSecret.tooltip: Get this from the dev portal

webserverPort.label: Dev.twitch.tv OAuth Redirect URL
webserverPort.tooltip: MUST match the dev portal exactly. MUST start with http://localhost: Don't change this unless you have a good reason to!

Python3Path.label: Python 3 'python.exe' directory. Must be at least V3.9
Python3Path.tooltip: Default is usually right. Google if you can't find it. Streamlabs Chatbot still needs Python 2.7

installDependencies.label: One-time setup - save settings first!
installDependencies.tooltip: Installs the twitch API for Python3

PurgeAll.label: Clear all winner entries
PurgeAll.tooltip: Fulfill ALL queue entries for a given user when they win

TicketsPerDay.label: Ticket growth per day, 0 for disabled
TicketsPerDay.tooltip: How fast do tickets grow? 0 means one is only worth one, ever. +1 every other day is 0.5, once a week would be 0.143 (1/7)

PurgeOld.label: Refund old entries
PurgeOld.tooltip: Reject any redemption whose age is greater than a threshold

OldAgeLimit.label: Max entry age before purge
OldAgeLimit.tooltip: Days after which a redemption will be rejected

UseViewerList.label: Use Viewer List - Enables next two settings

DrawViewersOnly.label: ONLY pick viewers
DrawViewersOnly.tooltip: Check this to exclude non-viewers from selection

ViewerAdvantageFactor.label: Viewer Advantage Factor
ViewerAdvantageFactor.tooltip: If viewer list is enabled, and not on Viewers Only, viewer entries will be multiplied by this amount. This multiplication will NOT be displayed in stats.

BlockDuplicates.label: Restrict duplicate selection
BlockDuplicates.tooltip: Check this to maintain a list of those already selected, and skip them from being picked again

ClearDuplicateList.label: Clear Used Name List
ClearDuplicateList.tooltip: Clear the list of duplciate names for the above setting
